annotations:
Fm: Saigal SeaTrade Mumbai   210824-TANKER087322
Dear Prathap,
Good Day!
Please find Owners terms for Chrtr's review and confirmation.
// //
we need charterers to confirm:
-  CHARTERER WARRANTS THAT THERE IS NO INVOLVEMENT OF ANY RUSSIAN BASED OR OWNED ENTITY IN ANY CAPACITY AND THAT THE CARGO IS NOT OF RUSSIAN ORIGIN IN FULL OR IN PART.
IN CASE IF IT APPEARS TO BE THERE IS INVOLVEMENT OF RUSSIAN BASED OR OWNED ENTITY OR ANY OTHER SANCTIONED ENTITY, IN ANY CAPACITY OF THE CARGO, OWNERS WILL DISCHARGE BACK THE CARGO TO THE LOADED FACILITY BACK WITH ALL DIRECT OR INDIRECT EXPENSES INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED BUNKERS, PORT COSTS (TO BE SETTLED DIRECTLY BY THEM), SHIFTING COSTS IF ANY TO BE FOR CHARTERERS ACCOUNT. ALL TIME DURING LOADING AND DISCHARGING BACK WILL BE CALCULATED DAILY BASIS ON DEMURRAGE RATE REGARDLESS OF THE LAYTIME.
For KYC clearance following documents are needed:
-  Full style of the Charterers (i.e. Full name, Address, E-mail(s), phone number(s))
- Banking details.
- Document and description of ownership structure (incl. UBO of company)
- Certificate of Incumbency (The Certificate shall indicate the name of the company, address, directors and shareholders.)
- Certificate of registry
- Company presentation
// //
Awaiting yours.
Best Regards,
Revanth B
+91 8099411054
From: Tankers-Trinity <tankers@trinity-ship.com>
Sent: 8/19/2024 12:35:19 PM
To: tanker@saigalseatrade.com <tanker@saigalseatrade.com>
Cc: Ravindraa- Trinity Ship <Ravindraa@trinity-ship.com>
Subject: CPP-VOYAGE ENQY // LIBYA-SUDAN  // DTD 19TH AUG
Dear Revanth,
Good day,
Pls find the below enqy from our direct chtrs and offer suitable vsl with owns frt idea,
Acct: Despina trading or Nom
Cargo: Gas oil
Qty: 30000MT
Loadport: Benghazi,Libya
Discharge port: Port sudan
Laycan: PPT
Frt idea : Chtrs invites owns best
Commission:3.75% ttl
Thanks & Best Regards,
Prathap Saminathan
Trinity Ship Brokers Ltd
MOB: +971 58 239 0168
